title: Water Strider
summaries: The Water Strider is a harmless critter that spawns on bodies of water on the Surface during the day. It only spawns near Sand or Jungle grass blocks, but not in the Ocean biome. It will not spawn if the wind speed exceeds 20 mph. The Water Strider moves by gliding on water and hopping around on land. The Water Strider has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Water Strider can be caught with any Bug Net to be carried around in the inventory and released later, or crafted into animated decorative furniture (Water Strider Cage). Once crafted, the Water Strider cannot be released again, unless the furniture item is de-crafted via Shimmer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
The Water Strider can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 17% bait power.
There is a 1/400 (0.25%) chance for a Gold Water Strider to spawn in place of an ordinary one.
